page.title: 08 ASH WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: The {Ash Women's Institute}meets on the second Monday of every month.They meet at Ash Village Hall from 8p.m. until 10:15p.m.The secretary is {Mrs {Gay}and the president is {Mrs Gould}. Mrs Gould has been president for 2 years. There are thirty_five people in the Womens Institute at present.To join the Institute you have to pay Â£4 a year. At their meetings they have activities like competitions and raffles.They invite different people each month to come and talk about things like Nursind and the Police Force. They have special events throughout the year like jumble sales,bingo and christmas parties. Anna Pullen. Laura Batstone
